Class ActivitiHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gr.cyberstream.workflow.engine.service.ActivitiHelper

  • public class ActivitiHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper functions for simplifying common tasks for Activiti processes etc.
    Author:
    nlyk

      Returns the task's form definition for the start event.
      No task id is presented, since the start event is only one
      static java.util.List<org.activiti.bpmn.model.FormProperty> getTaskFormDefinition(org.activiti.engine.RepositoryService repositoryService, java.lang.String processDefinitionId, java.lang.String taskId)
      Returns task's form definition.
      Used for completed tasks only.
      What it does, is to get the task's form elements by its bpmn model and fill the value of each property.
      Thats not available from any of activiti service, so we had to make one.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getTaskFormDefinition

        public static java.util.List<org.activiti.bpmn.model.FormProperty> getTaskFormDefinition(org.activiti.engine.RepositoryService repositoryService,
                                                                                         java.lang.String processDefinitionId,
                                                                                         java.lang.String taskId)
        Returns task's form definition.
        Used for completed tasks only.
        What it does, is to get the task's form elements by its bpmn model and fill the value of each property.
        Thats not available from any of activiti service, so we had to make one.
        Parameters:
        repositoryService - RepositoryService
        processDefinitionId - The process definition id
        taskId - The task id
        Returns:
        A list of FormProperty

      • getTaskFormDefinition

        public static java.util.List<org.activiti.bpmn.model.FormProperty> getTaskFormDefinition(org.activiti.engine.RepositoryService repositoryService,
                                                                                         java.lang.String processDefinitionId)
        Returns the task's form definition for the start event.
        No task id is presented, since the start event is only one
        Parameters:
        repositoryService - RepositoryService
        processDefinitionId - The process definition id
        Returns:
        A list of FormProperty
